title: a building that used to be a hardware store located on Market Street just north of Marsh Oaks.recently had its large sign that was in front of it vandelized.The sign was the outline of a birds head and was broken into pieces.Nothing else indicates what type of store it us,as all the windows are coverer. Can you say what type of business this is? And if the vandaization is being looked into?
